item.description:
As usual we'll make it worth your while to hear about our Trading Strategies and products with Plenty of Wine & Eats and we'll PAY for your Valet Parking! A little about BTR: We are a Forex Trading Company with offices in around the globe and head office in Boston. Our main goal is to "spread the word" about the opportunities to be had in trading on the forex markets and promote our Monthly Managed Account returns--which are nothing less than PHENOMENAL. Here are the event details:


DATE: Feb. 21 2008
TIME: 6pm
VENUE: FAIRMONT COPLEY HOTEL ~across from the Pru~
COPLEY SQUARE
Boston, MA 02110
617-292-2840


Our Boston Office Phone#: (617) 292-2840

Thanks & Hope to see you there!
item.why: You'll love it because you'll learn from a professional trader with 16 years trading experience. Not to mention that we're going ALL OUT with free wine,cheese & ors d'oeuvres, too!

group.name: Boston Traders Meetup to Teach/Learn Trading Strategies

item.name: Boston Trading & Research FOREX MEETUP
